about.heading: About Me

positions.title: Sr. Software Engineer
items: Leading the frontend website development team
Developing the website content management system used to promote online sales for our AntiVirus software products
Working with marketing and sales to prioritize features in an Agile environment
Developing a proprietary eCommerce framework with service-oriented architecture and React frontend shopping cart
Mentoring and training other developers to keep development tasks moving forward
Working on many high revenue generating projects such as the renew and upgrade product configurator, product recommendation tool, and cart upsell interstitials
Implementing multivariate testing solutions and setting up variations to optimize revenue streams
Facilitating major application upgrades and server environment upgrades
Using PHP, SQL, JavaScript, jQuery, React, HTML, LESS, Git, SSH and Photoshop

positions.title: Software Engineer
items: Developed responsive Wordpress themes with custom backend features tailored to each client's Business
Integrated eCommerce platforms OpenCart and Magento into custom designed websites
Collaborated with local business owners to define technical requirements
Provided estimates, architected many custom solutions, and engineered reusable components to increase development efficiency
Between development tasks, I also provided technical support to all clients and managed their payment processing
Used PHP, SQL, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, SASS, SSH and Photoshop

positions.title: Software Engineer
items: Developed advanced document scanning software with optical character recognition
Updated multiple systems with content management and workflow management integrations
Managed estimates, planning, developing, testing, and documenting all software application changes while providing hands on technical support
Coordinated multiteam code relases and prepared contingency plans
Scripted macro instructions to streamline quality assurance testing
Used VB6, VB.NET, SQL, JSON, XML and SOAP
